summary: Diff implements the FAQ removals/edits (pricing question removed; photography partner referral removed) and updates header/footer/index.html branding to “Wed Shilpi”. Social icons appear removed from the footer, but the diff summary does not provide enough evidence to confirm brand rename and social-icon removal across all other site locations.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the site/company name everywhere in user-facing copy from "aurora" to "Wed Shilpi" (including header/footer branding text, image alt text, and copyright text where applicable).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows updates in the header/footer image alt text and footer copyright, and index.html title, but provides no evidence that all other user-facing copy across the site was checked/updated (e.g., Hero/Services/Process/Contact copy).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions other sections but does not show their copy)

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the social media icons/links for Facebook, Instagram, X, and LinkedIn from the site (including the footer icon row).
missing_requirements.reason: Footer appears to have removed social icons/links (only Email/WhatsApp are shown), but the diff summary does not provide evidence that no Facebook/Instagram/X/LinkedIn icons/links remain elsewhere on the site.
evidence: frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFooter.tsx (truncated; footer shows only Mail/MessageCircle imports and Email/WhatsApp links)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (claims social media icons removed, but does not enumerate all locations)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/retained a Caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking in the footer.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not ask to add or modify third-party attribution/UTM tracking links; this appears unrelated to renaming/removals.
